query:
SELECT a.id, a.username, a.platform, a.deviceId, a.status, d.status as device_status, d.deviceName 
FROM accounts a 
LEFT JOIN devices d ON a.deviceId = d.deviceId 
WHERE a.platform = 'twitter' 
ORDER BY a.id DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3acLf9NzZ7hRWmZ.d99a3ea649fd --database 6jtzrVB6wF9khFezaTmFpE --execute SELECT a.id, a.username, a.platform, a.deviceId, a.status, d.status as device_status, d.deviceName

ORDER BY a.id DESC;
